query:
SELECT l.id, l.nome, l.numeroLoja
FROM users u
JOIN gestores g ON u.id = g.userId
JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId
JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Marco Vilar%'
ORDER BY l.nome;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT l.id, l.nome, l.numeroLoja
FROM users u
JOIN gestores g ON u.id = g.userId
JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId
JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Marco Vilar%'
ORDER BY l.nome;
